title: Chipotle Says Costs Remain High as It Raises Menu Prices
sub_head: Burrito chain plans cites price increases in helping lift sales as it looks to expand
body:
Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc. said it increased menu prices again, as its chief executive officer said higher costs are unlikely to abate.
Higher menu prices helped the burrito chain boost sales in recent months as it pursues a plan to build hundreds more stores in the coming year, the company said.
